medical_history.chief_complaint: Symptoms suggestive of Cushingâ€™s syndrome including muscle weakness, easy bruising, skin rash, hyperdefecation, and multiple rib fractures.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented in March 1996 with the recent onset of moderately severe ACTH-dependent Cushing's syndrome. Symptoms developed after the removal of a 5-cm medullary thyroid carcinoma in 1992, with a history of bilateral renal stones.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of bilateral renal stones; underwent thyroidectomy for a 5-cm medullary thyroid carcinoma in 1992.
medical_history.family_history: Mother, sister, and a nephew also had medullary thyroid carcinoma.
